verses.verse: Oh give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; For he is good <WH2896>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let Israel <WH3478> now say <WH559>, That his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let the house <WH1004> of Aaron <WH175> now say <WH559>, That his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let them now that fear <WH3373> Jehovah <WH3068> say <WH559>, That his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Out of my distress <WH4712> I called <WH7121> upon Jehovah <WH3050>: Jehovah <WH3050> answered <WH6030> me and set me in a large place <WH4800>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is on my side <WH3372>; I will not fear: What can <WH6213> man <WH120> do unto me <WH6213>?
Jehovah <WH3068> is on my side among them that help <WH5826> me <WH7200>: Therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me <WH8130>.
It is better <WH2896> to take refuge <WH2620> in Jehovah <WH3068> Than to put confidence <WH982> in man <WH120>.
It is better <WH2896> to take refuge <WH2620> in Jehovah <WH3068> Than to put confidence <WH982> in princes <WH5081>.
All nations <WH1471> compassed me about <WH5437>: In the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068> I will cut them off <WH4135>.
They compassed me about <WH5437>; yea <WH5437>, they compassed me about: In the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068> I will cut them off <WH4135>.
They compassed me about <WH5437> like bees <WH1682>; They are quenched <WH1846> as the fire <WH784> of thorns <WH6975>: In the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068> I will cut them off <WH4135>.
Thou didst thrust <WH1760> sore <WH1760> at me that I might fall <WH5307>; But Jehovah <WH3068> helped me <WH5826>.
Jehovah <WH3050> is my strength <WH5797> and song <WH2176>; And he is become my salvation <WH3444>.
The voice <WH6963> of rejoicing <WH7440> and salvation <WH3444> is in the tents <WH168> of the righteous <WH6662>: The right hand <WH3225> of Jehovah <WH3068> doeth <WH6213> valiantly <WH2428>.
The right hand <WH3225> of Jehovah <WH3068> is exalted <WH7426>: The right hand <WH3225> of Jehovah <WH3068> doeth <WH6213> valiantly <WH2428>.
I shall not die <WH4191>, but live <WH2421>, And declare <WH5608> the works <WH4639> of Jehovah <WH3050>.
Jehovah <WH3050> hath chastened <WH3256> me sore <WH3256>; But he hath not given me over <WH5414> unto death <WH4194>.
Open <WH6605> to me the gates <WH8179> of righteousness <WH6664>: I will enter <WH935> into them <WH3034>, I will give thanks unto Jehovah <WH3050>.
This is the gate <WH8179> of Jehovah <WH3068>; The righteous <WH6662> shall enter into it <WH935>.
I will give thanks <WH3034> unto thee <WH6030>; for thou hast answered me <WH3444>, And art become my salvation.
The stone <WH68> which the builders <WH1129> rejected <WH3988> Is become the head <WH7218> of the corner <WH6438>.
This is Jehovah <WH3068>'s doing <WH6381>; It is marvellous in our eyes <WH5869>.
This is the day <WH3117> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath made <WH6213>; We will rejoice <WH1523> and be glad in it <WH1523>.
Save <WH3467> now <WH577>, we beseech thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah: O Jehovah <WH3068>, we beseech <WH577> thee <WH6743>, send now prosperity.
Blessed <WH1288> be he that cometh <WH935> in the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>: We have blessed <WH1288> you out of the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is God <WH410>, and he hath given us light <WH215>: Bind <WH631> the sacrifice <WH2282> with cords <WH5688>, even unto the horns <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196>.
Thou art my God <WH410>, and I will give thanks <WH3034> unto thee <WH430>: Thou art my God, I will exalt thee <WH7311>.
Oh give thanks <WH3034> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; For he is good <WH2896>; For his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
